DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate efficacy Valeriana officinalis L. 100 mg single oral dose one hour preoperative conscious sedation impact low third molar surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Valerian Conscious Sedation Patients Submitted Impacted Lower Third Molars Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate efficacy Valeriana officinalis L. ( Valerian ) control anxiety third molar surgery . Study design : A single oral dose either valerian ( 100 mg ) placebo randomly administer one hour surgical procedure 20 volunteer 17 31 year age . Anxiety level assess questionnaire , physiological parameter ( blood pressure heart rate ) observation sign .
DOC.criteria: Indication bilateral extraction asymptomatic impact mandibular third molar similar position base Pell & Gregory classification Use type medication 15 day prior onset study ; history hypersensitivity drug , substance material employ experiment ; pregnancy lactation
